title: Crew Show (Hellish Hydrogen Road Trip)
description:
Zack is back from road tripping a hydrogen car and it couldn't have gone worse. Seriously, his story is insane.  After that, Matt tells us about the Mercedes GLA 45 AMG he's been driving, and then we answer a bunch of fan questions.  

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping.

 

Raycon’s offering 15% off all their products for [Smoking Tire] listeners: go to BuyRaycon.com/smoking.

 

JB Weld: Available at JBWeld.com, Walmart, Amazon, Home Depot, Lowe's, AutoZone, Advance Auto Parts, NAPA, O'Reilly, Michael's, and more.
